welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Manville, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the unique experiences this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi for free with a one-time registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport primarily serves regional airlines and offers a more compact and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
